divs: Sighting DetailsOn April 9, 2012 at 2140 hours I was driving the patrol vehicle around the property when I notice a bright light that risen from the tree tops. When the light moved it would brighten. And when it stopped it would go completly dim, so all you coould see is a black mass outline of the object. I followed the object for about 2 miles until it head east of the James River. No video or Picture of the object. As much as I see these UFO's I wil start to carry a video camera at work.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Surry
There were no other sightings in Surry on or around April 9th 2012
